name: fullstackopen-part-3-deploying-phonebook
description: Repository for Part-3 of FullStack course from fullstackopen.com

scripts.build:ui: rd /s /q build && cd ../Part-3-Frontend && npm run build --prod && Xcopy /S /I /E build C:\Users\krukh\OneDrive\Desktop\FullStackOpen-Part-3-Deploying-Phonebook\build
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
